Container.Name: sublarr
Container.Overview: Standalone Subtitle Manager and Translator for Anime/Media (v0.9.0-beta). Downloads subtitles from 11 providers (AnimeTosho, Jimaku, OpenSubtitles, SubDL, Gestdown, Podnapisi, Kitsunekko, Napisy24, Titrari, LegendasDivx, and custom plugins). Translates via multiple backends (Ollama, DeepL, LibreTranslate, OpenAI-compatible, Google). Supports Whisper speech-to-text fallback, standalone mode (no Sonarr/Radarr required), Plex/Kodi/Jellyfin/Emby library refresh, forced subtitle management, event hooks, dark/light theme, and English/German UI.
Container.Description: Standalone Subtitle Manager and Translator for Anime/Media. A Bazarr replacement with ASS-first subtitle scoring, multi-backend LLM translation, plugin system, Whisper speech-to-text, and standalone folder-watch mode. Supports 11 built-in providers plus custom plugins.
